alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Decatur; Grady; Seminole; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:51PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Jackson, northern Gadsden, northeastern Jefferson, northeastern Leon, southern Decatur, southern Grady, southern Thomas, southwestern Brooks and southeastern Seminole Counties through 730 PM EDT/630 PM CDT/... At 651 PM EDT/551 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of Havana to 9 miles south of Quitman. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Thomasville, Havana, Cairo, Quitman, Bainbridge, Boston, Whigham, Chattahoochee, Gretna, Attapulgus, Climax, Alma, Everett, Jamieson, Rocky Hill, Recovery, Miccosukee, Laingkat and Calvary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
